item.title: Our goals in 2023
item.description: Why doodles In order to create great games. After dicussion we deiced to make some doodles first. This concept comes from Google Doodles. Doodles is a part used to verify gameplay and develop ideas. Each doodle may not be able to fully experience every aspect of the game, and it may even be a special version under development. The reason for releasing it was to test one of our ideas more quickly.
